page.title: 15TWEEDSIDE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The main industries are: McCREATH,SIMPSON AND PRENTICE:barley malters.Started Alnwick 1866;Berwick 1957.Reasons:rail transport,ground water supplies(100M galls.per year), locally-grown barley plus imports through Tweedmouth Dock.Market: brewing and whisky distilling. JUS-ROL:pastry confectioners.Workforce numbers 455,mostly women, and is expanding.Work in 3 shifts;all union members.Flour imported from canada, milled at Leith.130 tons used each week.Also make potato croquettes; potatoes from America and local. Products are sold nationally. PRINGLES:quality woollens.Started 1948.446 employees.Other branches in Hawick and Galashiels.Berwick makes 60% of total output.Quality is tightly controlled.25000 garments per week. Wool used is English.
